name: detailed_cocktail_recipe_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool the_cocktail_db.
Tool description: Cocktail recipes with high-quality images stored on AWS S3 for fast accessibility. Easy to use!
Category: Food
API description: Fetches a detailed cocktail recipe by its ID from the Cocktail DB API.

is_id.description: The ID of the cocktail to fetch the recipe for.
